question.xref: DES s6, HC p102, KYTS p90
question.text: You see this signal overhead on the motorway. What does it mean?

explanation.text: You will see this sign if there has been an incident ahead and the motorway is closed. You MUST obey the sign. Make sure that you prepare to leave as soon as you see the warning sign. Don’t pull over at the last moment or cut across other traffic.

answer.text: Leave the motorway at the next exit
All vehicles use the hard shoulder
Sharp bend to the left ahead
